name: 4Ever Face Wash Hibiscus
description: Enriched with hibiscus extracts, minerals and vitamins, this gentle face wash thoroughly cleanses and purifies while preserving the moisture of the skin. Formulated to skin pH of 5.5 – 6.0, this face wash, nourishes, whitens and helps to stay lighten and fresh. Preferred for normal to dry skin. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
